channel.title: Invalid Username or Password ( HELP! )
channel.description:
Ok, I went on my server to put a password on my character.. and I logged out and then I tried to login again, but theres not password slot the only slots are, Username, and Server. How do I enter my password in?! Do I have to code it so that it has a password slot?!
The file shows you what the login screen looks like..
